actions.text: Amendment SA 3475 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Gregg to Amendment SA 3400. (consideration: CR S7265-7267) To enable military family members to take time off to attend to deployment-related business, tasks, and other family issues.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3475 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Gregg to Amendment SA 3400.

amends_amendment.purpose: To enable military family members to take leave to attend to deployment-related business and tasks.

purpose: To enable military family members to take time off to attend to deployment-related business, tasks, and other family issues.
